message: This is a question for the community
However when I play my brother on game center games his results and achievements are posted on my game center account
I have an iPhone4 and bought my 12 year old brother an iPod Touch4. We use my appleID so we wouldn't have to buy all the  apps again twice
Apple can't expect 1 Idevice in families of 3 kids
Apple allows upto 5 idevices to share apps already purchased
So my question is..how do I create an additional game center account?
